title: PIM: enabling B2B addOns
description:
Description
For B2B customer the following B2B products should be enabled:
Company Start
Company Pro
Business DSL Start
Business DSL Pro
Business Glasfaser Start
Business Glasfaser Pro
As these products might as well have addOns, the list of GK addOns have to be adjusted and the following addOns have to be removed from that list:
  AddOn Material Number
